review: *** **** ** *** **** * I went to her for my Invisalign treatment, which just got done last week. The treatment has made a huge difference to my teeth, and my life, and I have only Dr. Nilo to thank for it. She was extremely patient, cooperative and responsive with her work. Also, the treatment was relatively affordable as compared to the other doctors that I had consulted. All in all, a great experience! Would definitely recommend Dr. Nilo to all those looking for dental treatments in Mumbai.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My treatment is finally over. There is a very distinct difference in my teeth post the treatment. My jaw pictures will speak for themselves. Nilofer was extremely patient. She knew exactly what to do when. The treatment was flawless. I had no diet restrictions from day 1.

Dr Nilufer has an excellent way of making her patients feel at ease;she is very good in her field and explains the procedure with all its pros and cons ! She treated my son for his irregular teeth ,and being a dentist myself I trust her completely!  Wishing her all the best and God bless.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Nilofer has been the best dentist I have ever had. She is just flawless! I have never felt any sort of discomfort during my treatment. She is one of those doctors who will go the extra mile during the treatment.
My doctor was more than a friend...very cooperate and I'm extremely satisfied with my treatment results
when i say "she is awesome" ,  might actually be a under statement  ..... i didn't feel like i went to a doctor . we were friends by the second appointment, ha ha ha ha .........

As his her motto she strives to make people smile. The noble profession of medicine is but an opportunity to extend this wish of hers. Such sincere people can give a feel good factor which may be supplemental to medicine and surgery.

review: I had an amazing journey with Dr nilofer currawala regarding my theeth alignment....she is an amazing person,very friendly,helpful and well trained doctor.Must visit her for best Invisalign braces for over crowding teeth or crooked or for simple smile make over.Trust me u won't regret ur decesion.
